name: auto-open-remote-folder
description: Automatically opens a configured folder when connecting to a remote machine via SSH

autoOpenRemoteFolder.defaultPath.description: Default folder path to open when connecting to a remote machine. Use {project} placeholder for project name detection.
autoOpenRemoteFolder.defaultPath.markdownDescription: Default folder path to open when connecting to a remote machine. Use `{project}` placeholder for project name detection (e.g., `/local/src/{project}`).

autoOpenRemoteFolder.projectMapping.description: Map remote host names to specific project folders. Format: {"hostname": "/path/to/project"}
autoOpenRemoteFolder.projectMapping.markdownDescription: Map remote host names to specific project folders. Format: `{"hostname": "/path/to/project"}`
